examples.example: 后来我经过不断努力，终于实现了自己的梦想。

translate.english: Later, through continuous efforts, I finally achieved my dream.

examples.example: 后来的日子里，他通过自己的拼搏收获了满满的幸福。

translate.english: In the later days, he reaped full happiness through his own hard work.

examples.example: 后来我凭借自己的坚持和努力，过上了理想的生活。

translate.english: Later, I lived an ideal life by relying on my own perseverance and hard work.
